answer:
Acesta este schema logică completă funcțională a sistemului Kelion AI în ASCII art:

```
+----------------+     +----------------+     +----------------+     +-------------+
|                |     |                |     |                |     |             |
|  User Speaks/  | --> |  realtime-voice | --> |  supreme-brain | --> |  Kimi Analyze |
|  Types Input   |     |   .js (Voice)  |     |   .js (Kimi   |     |   Request    |
|                |     |                |     |   K2.5)       |     |             |
+----------------+     +----------------+     +----------------+     +-------------+
                                                                |
                                                                V
                                                                |
                                                                |
                                                                V
                                                                |
                                                                |
                                                                +----------------+
                                                                |                |
                                                                |  Kimi         |
                                                                |  delegateTo   |
                                                                |  Specialists  |
                                                                |                |
                                                                +----------------+
                                                                        |
                                                                        V
                                                                        |
                                                                        V
                                                                        |
                                                                        |
                                                                        +----------------+
                                                                        |                |
                                                                        |  Kimi         |
                                                                        |  Verify       |
                                                                        |  Responses    |
                                                                        |                |
                                                                        +----------------+
                                                                        |
                                                                        V
                                                                        |
                                                                        V
                                                                        |
                                                                        |
                                                                        +----------------+
                                                                        |                |
                                                                        |  Kimi         |
                                                                        |  Create       |
                                                                        |  Final        |
                                                                        |  Answer       |
                                                                        |                |
                                                                        +----------------+
```

```
+----------------+     +-------------+     +------------+     +---------+
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
+----------------+     +-------------+     +------------+     +---------+
|                |     |             |     |            |     |         |
|  AI-urile      |     | GPT-4o      |     | Perplexity  |     | DALL-E   |
|  externe       |     | Vision      |     | (Weather)   |     |          |
|                |     | (Image)     |     |            |     |          |
+----------------+     +-------------+     +------------+     +---------+
```

```
+----------------+     +------------+     +--------+     +----------+
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
+----------------+     +------------+     +--------+     +----------+
|                |     |            |     |        |     |          |
|                |     | DeepSeek   |     |       | Memory  | Navigate |
|                |     | (Code)     |     |       |  (Supabase) |   |
|                |     |            |     |       |          |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |          |          |
|                |     |            |     |        |          |          |
+----------------+     +------------+     +--------+     +----------+
```

```
+----------------+     +-------------+
|                |     |             |
|                |     |             |
|                |     |             |
|                |     |             |
|                |     |             |
+----------------+     +-------------+
|                |     |             |
|                |     | speakWithTTS|
|                |     | (Voice)    |
|                |     +-------------+
|                |     |             |
|                |     | addMessageTo|
|                |     | Chat (Text) |
|                |     |             |
+----------------+     +-------------+
```

```
+----------------+     +-------------+     +-------------+
|                |     |             |     |             |
|                |     |             |     |             |
|                |     |             |     |             |
|                |     |             |     |             |
|                |     |             |     |             |
+----------------+     +-------------+     +-------------+
|                |     |             |     |             |
|                |     | kWorkspace. |     | kWorkspace. |
|                |     | showText     |     | showImage   |
|                |     | (Workspace)  |     | (Workspace) |
|                |     |             |     |             |
+----------------+     +-------------+     +-------------+
```

Legenda pentru condițiile de selectare a AI-urilor în regex:

- `|.imagine_atasata` -> GPT-4o Vision
- `/vreme|weather|meteo|temperatur|forecast|prognoz|ploaie|soare|frig|cald/` -> Perplexity + Weather
- `/unde.*sunt|unde.*aflu|where.*am|locat|gps|poziti/` -> Location (GPS)
- `/generez.*imagine|creeaz.*poz|picture|image|desen/` -> DALL-E
- `/generez.*video|creeaz.*video|clip|film/` -> Replicate Video
- `/caut|search|gase|find|wiki|info|stiri|news/` -> Perplexity
- `/cod|code|program|script|debug|eroare|bug/` -> DeepSeek
- `/tii.*minte|remember|amintesti|memorie/` -> Memory (Supabase)
- `/workspace|spatiu.*lucru|zona.*lucru/` -> Workspace Panel
- `/navighez|directions|drum|ruta/` -> Google Maps

Această schema reflectă fluxul complet a datelor și interacțiunile dintre componentele sistemului Kelion AI, de la intrare până la ieșire.
